document.heading: Ward 5 Neighborhood Investment Fund Boundary Expansion Amendment Act of 2010

history.narrative: Law 18-246, the “Ward 5 Neighborhood Investment Fund Boundary Expansion Amendment Act of 2010”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 18-800, which was referred to the Committee on Economic Development. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 29, 2010, and July 13, 2010, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on July 10, 2010, it was assigned Act No. 18-497 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 18-246 became effective on October 26, 2010.
